title.narrative: Papua New Guinea Health Scholarship Awards

description.narrative: The Papua New Guinea Health Scholarship Awards will support Papua New Guinea to increase the size and quality of its health workforce by: (a) supporting an in country health worker scholarships pilot program to be implemented under the Australian Regional Development Scholarships (ARDS) Scheme and will include up to 80 scholarships in midwifery at one of the four Midwifery Training Schools and up to 20 Scholarships in community health at St Gerard's Community Health Worker Training School; and (b) providing support to the Office of Higher Education and the National Department of Health to undertake Quality Audits/ Capacity Diagnostics of all Health Worker Training Schools compliant with PNG National Accreditation Frameworks. The total value of this initiative is $2.9 million over 2 years, starting 2011-12.

participating-org.narrative: Australia - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
